Uses of Class
software.amazon.qldb.RetryPolicy

  • Packages that use RetryPolicy 
    Package Description
    software.amazon.qldb  

    • Uses of RetryPolicy in software.amazon.qldb

      Methods in software.amazon.qldb that return RetryPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      RetryPolicy RetryPolicy.Builder.build()
      Construct a RetryPolicy with the current configuration in the builder.
      static RetryPolicy RetryPolicy.maxRetries​(int maxRetries)
      Factory method to create a RetryPolicy with the maximum retry number that a transaction will be executed.
      static RetryPolicy RetryPolicy.none()
      Factory method to create a RetryPolicy that will not retry.
      Methods in software.amazon.qldb with parameters of type RetryPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <T> T QldbDriver.execute​(Executor<T> executor, RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
      Execute the Executor lambda against QLDB and retrieve the result within a transaction.
      void QldbDriver.execute​(ExecutorNoReturn executor, RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
      Execute the Executor lambda against QLDB within a transaction where no result is expected.
      QldbDriverBuilder QldbDriverBuilder.transactionRetryPolicy​(RetryPolicy retryPolicy)
      Specify the retry policy that will be used to execute the transactions.
